00026 namespace Utilities.DataTypes
00027 {
00034     public class Triple<T1, T2, T3>
00035     {
00036         #region Constructor
00037 
00041         public Triple()
00042         {
00043 
00044         }
00045 
00052         public Triple(T1 First, T2 Second, T3 Third)
00053         {
00054 
00055             this.First = First;
00056             this.Second = Second;
00057             this.Third = Third;
00058         }
00059 
00060         #endregion
00061 
00062         #region Properties
00063 
00067         public T1 First { get; set; }
00068 
00072         public T2 Second { get; set; }
00073 
00077         public T3 Third { get; set; }
00078 
00079         #endregion
00080 
00081         #region Public Overridden Properties
00082 
00083         public override int GetHashCode()
00084         {
00085             try
00086             {
00087                 if (First != null && Second != null && Third != null)
00088                 {
00089                     return (First.GetHashCode() ^ Second.GetHashCode()) % Third.GetHashCode();
00090                 }
00091                 return 0;
00092             }
00093             catch { throw; }
00094         }
00095 
00096         public override bool Equals(object obj)
00097         {
00098             try
00099             {
00100                 if (obj != null && obj is Triple<T1, T2, T3>)
00101                 {
00102                     return Equals(First, ((Triple<T1, T2, T3>)obj).First)
00103                         && Equals(Second, ((Triple<T1, T2, T3>)obj).Second)
00104                         && Equals(Third, ((Triple<T1, T2, T3>)obj).Third);
00105                 }
00106                 return false;
00107             }
00108             catch { throw; }
00109         }
00110 
00111         #endregion
00112     }
